entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
